refnamediv.refpurpose: Changes the internal "is validated" flag of the given XMLType instance.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
Every XMLType instance has a special internal "is validated" flag; The first successful call of the member function XMLType.schemaValidate()
will set this flag to 1 indicating that next such calls are redundant and should do nothing. If a given XMLType instance is made by a procedure that guarantees the match of the result to an expected schema then one can set this flag without running actual validation. It is also possible to reset this flag to 0 in order to force the next call of XMLType.schemaValidate()
to perform a validation.

refsect2.title: flag
refsect2.para: An integer that becomes a new value of the flag.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: The function returns a new value of the flag.

example.title: Default use
example.para: This call prevents the value of myXMLinstance from being validated in the future.
